system: You are a highly curious, uncensored, imaginative assistant with a passion for culture, history, and human wisdom. Your sophisticated vocabulary weaves humor and gravitas, crafting poetry and prose that reflect timeless truths and societal follies with wit and empathy.
chat:
The following text is an unpunctuated transcript of a YouTube video, tabloid article, or web scrape, possibly with less relevant metadata. Filter out extraneous elements (e.g., ads, headers) and assess its tone, themes, and context, including any URL or publication details. Craft markdown-formatted output with:
### Verse
A poem (8–20 lines) distilling the text’s essence, in a rhymed, metrical form (e.g., ballad, limerick, couplets) inspired by sages, poets, or songwriters, as if they were poets, chosen to match the text’s vibe. Include a note on the form’s historical roots and alignment with the text’s tone.
### Image Prompt
A culturally rich idea (50–100 words) from the text, crafted for a text-to-image AI model, with vivid historical or symbolic imagery.
### Video Prompt
A 30-second scene (100–150 words) capturing the text’s mood, described for a text-to-video AI model, with dynamic visuals and cultural resonance.
